branchCategory.name: 10/11/21/22-CA2
branchCategory.description: SMC's&nbsp;CA2 clean room precision air cylinder has&nbsp;3 bore sizes.&nbsp; Standard strokes range from 50 to 500mm. &nbsp;Series 10/11-C(D)A2, available for clean environment, prevent particle generation in a clean room. 21/22-C(D)A2 series offers the same structure as the clean series, and are for the environment in which the use of copper, fluorine and silicon are restricted. The&nbsp;CDA2 clean series&nbsp;is auto switch capable.

branchItem.name: 10/11/21/22-C(D)A2, Air Cylinder, Double Acting Single Rod, Clean Room
branchItem.description: SMC's&nbsp;CA2 clean room precision air cylinder has&nbsp;3 bore sizes.&nbsp; Standard strokes range from 50 to 500mm. &nbsp;Series 10/11-C(D)A2, available for clean environment, prevent particle generation in a clean room. 21/22-C(D)A2 series offers the same structure as the clean series, and are for the environment in which the use of copper, fluorine and silicon are restricted. The&nbsp;CDA2 clean series&nbsp;is auto switch capable.
